overview: In Lucas Knight's Shooting Raw, Lucas Knight is a New York City-based photographer who mixes his professional and sex lives together! In two separate encounters, Lucas gets his ass fucked bareback by Michael Lucas, and then later he answers his topping desire by pounding Brent Alex raw. Jimmie Slater gets in on the action and seduces Nigel Banks into sex. And in a bonus scene, Alessio Romero stars in a foursome featuring Jimmie Slater, Adam Isaacs, and BJ Rhubarb!
title: Lucas Knight's Shooting Raw
